title: Did President Trump donate his first four-year salary in 2018 to the Ministry of Veterans' Affairs?
subtitle: In line with his promise in his campaign to give up a presidential salary, the White House announced in May 2018 that Trump would donate $100,000 to veterans.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In May 2018, President Trump donated a quarter of his annual salary of $400,000 to the Department of Veterans Affairs.
